commonPattern.teamConfigurations: Î™®Îì† KBO ÌåÄÏùò ÏÉâÏÉÅ, Î°úÍ≥†, Î©îÌÉÄÎç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞

suggestedScripts.dev:precompute: npm run precompute && echo 'All precomputed data generated!'
suggestedScripts.build:with-precompute: npm run precompute && npm run build

automation.githubActions:
# .github/workflows/update-precomputed-data.yml
name: Update Precomputed Data
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 2 * * *'  # Îß§Ïùº Ïò§Ï†Ñ 2Ïãú
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  update-data:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'
      - run: npm install
      - run: npm run precompute
      - name: Commit changes
        run: |
          git config --local user.email "action@github.com"
          git config --local user.name "GitHub Action"
          git add data/ magic-number/data/
          git commit -m "ü§ñ ÏûêÎèô ÏÇ¨Ï†ÑÍ≥ÑÏÇ∞ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏" || exit 0
          git push
automation.cronJob:
# crontab entry for server deployment
0 2 * * * cd /path/to/kbo && npm run precompute >/dev/null 2>&1

beforeOptimization.clientSideCalculations: High CPU usage for matrix operations
